content.html: I'm open-sourcing Actual. I'm sad that I couldn't make it work as a sustainable company, but I've seen the magic of open-source before and I'm excited about what can happen here. Read more! actualbudget.com/open-source
content.value:
I'm open-sourcing Actual.

I'm sad that I couldn't make it work as a sustainable company, but I've seen the magic of open-source before and I'm excited about what can happen here. Read more!

actualbudget.com/open-source

content.html: This is how every product should "shut down" once the owners decide to move on to something different, and at the same time give the project the chance to get a new life. James decided to open source the project instead of just closing down.
content.value:
This is how every product should "shut down" once the owners decide to move on to something different, and at the same time give the project the chance to get a new life. 
James decided to open source the project instead of just closing down.
